languages.text: {n}Видимость ограничена из-за дыма и мрака, но, судя по вони ржавчины и немытых тел, вы где-то на нижних палубах. В отдалении слышны треск пламени, стоны, крики, и грохот падающих балок. Катастрофа не пощадила и этот отсек.{/n}

{n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Видимость ограничена из-за дыма и мрака, но, судя по вони ржавчины и немытых тел, вы где-то на нижних палубах. В отдалении слышны треск пламени, стоны, крики, и грохот падающих балок. Катастрофа не пощадила и этот отсек.{/n}

You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

{n}The visibility around you has become limited by smoke and darkness, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

{n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

{n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El humo y la oscuridad limitan tu visión, pero, a juzgar por la peste a óxido y sudor, te encuentras en algún punto de las cubiertas inferiores. Puedes oír el chisporroteo de las llamas, quejidos, gritos y el temblor de vigas caídas a lo lejos. El desastre también ha afectado a este compartimento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El humo y la oscuridad limitan tu visión, pero, a juzgar por la peste a óxido y sudor, te encuentras en algún punto de las cubiertas inferiores. Puedes oír el chisporroteo de las llamas, quejidos, gritos y el temblor de vigas caídas a lo lejos. El desastre también ha afectado a este compartimento.{/n}

languages.text: {n}煙と暗闇で辺りがよく見えないが、錆のひどい臭いと下層階級の死体から判断して、ここは下位デッキのどこかだろう。遠くから炎のパチパチという音、うめき声、悲鳴、梁の落下音が聞こえる。この区画は、災害を避けられなかったのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}煙と暗闇で辺りがよく見えないが、錆のひどい臭いと下層階級の死体から判断して、ここは下位デッキのどこかだろう。遠くから炎のパチパチという音、うめき声、悲鳴、梁の落下音が聞こえる。この区画は、災害を避けられなかったのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管周围漆黑一片，到处都是烟雾，但根据周围的铁锈味和体臭来判断，你应该是在底层甲板的某个地方。你听到了火焰的噼啪声、呻吟声、尖叫声，以及远处的横梁掉落时发出的轰隆声。这个舱室也同样受到了灾难波及。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管周围漆黑一片，到处都是烟雾，但根据周围的铁锈味和体臭来判断，你应该是在底层甲板的某个地方。你听到了火焰的噼啪声、呻吟声、尖叫声，以及远处的横梁掉落时发出的轰隆声。这个舱室也同样受到了灾难波及。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Rauch und Dunkelheit behindern deine Sicht, doch dem Gestank nach Rost und ungewaschenen Körpern nach zu urteilen befindest du dich irgendwo auf den Unterdecks. Du hörst das Knistern von Flammen, stöhnende und schreiende Stimmen, das Donnern von herabstürzenden Balken in der Ferne. Die Katastrophe hat dieses Modul nicht verschont.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Rauch und Dunkelheit behindern deine Sicht, doch dem Gestank nach Rost und ungewaschenen Körpern nach zu urteilen befindest du dich irgendwo auf den Unterdecks. Du hörst das Knistern von Flammen, stöhnende und schreiende Stimmen, das Donnern von herabstürzenden Balken in der Ferne. Die Katastrophe hat dieses Modul nicht verschont.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bien que la fumée et les ténèbres limitent grandement la visibilité, l'odeur de rouille et de crasse vous laisse à penser que vous vous trouvez quelque part sur les ponts inférieurs. D'un peu plus loin vous parviennent des crépitements de flammes, des grognements, des cris et le grondement de poutres qui s'effondrent. Ce compartiment ne semble pas avoir été épargné non plus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que la fumée et les ténèbres limitent grandement la visibilité, l'odeur de rouille et de crasse vous laisse à penser que vous vous trouvez quelque part sur les ponts inférieurs. D'un peu plus loin vous parviennent des crépitements de flammes, des grognements, des cris et le grondement de poutres qui s'effondrent. Ce compartiment ne semble pas avoir été épargné non plus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dumandan ve karanlıktan bir şey görmek hayli zor olsa da pas ve yıkanmamış bedenlerin kokusundan alt güvertede bir yerde olduğunuz anlaşılıyor. Ateş çıtırtıları, iniltiler, çığlıklar ve yıkılan sütunların sesleri uzaklardan geliyor. Facia, bu kompartımana da uğramış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Smoke and darkness limit your vision, but, judging by the stench of rust and unwashed bodies, you are somewhere on the lower decks. You can hear the crackling of flames, groans, screams, and the rumble of falling beams coming from the distance. The disaster has not spared this compartment.{/n}
